file.name: deviceBundle.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Device Management - Bundle
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths: {}

components:
  parameters:
    bundleId:
      name: bundleId
      in: path
      description: The ID of the Bundle on which to perform the operation
      schema:
        type: string
      required: true
  schemas:
    deviceBundle:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        name:
          type: string
        state:
          type: string
        version:
          type: string
      example:
        id: 0
        name: org.eclipse.osgi
        state: ACTIVE
        version: 3.12.50.v20170928-1321
    deviceBundles:
      type: object
      properties:
        bundle:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/deviceBundle'
      example:
        type: deviceBundles
        bundle:
          - id: 0
            name: org.eclipse.osgi
            state: ACTIVE
            version: 3.12.50.v20170928-1321
          - id: 1
            name: org.eclipse.equinox.cm
            state: ACTIVE
            version: 1.2.0.v20170105-1446
